name: Codex CLI with o1 Model
description: Tests the o1 model's advanced reasoning capabilities for complex code generation

config.prompt: Create a comprehensive test suite for this repository. Analyze the code, understand its purpose, and write unit tests that cover the main functionality. Use appropriate testing frameworks and follow best practices.

assertions.test_files_created: Test files were created. Score 1 if true, 0 if false.
assertions.test_coverage: Tests cover main functionality. Score 1 if comprehensive, 0.5 if partial, 0 if minimal.
assertions.tests_runnable: Tests are properly structured and can be run. Score 1 if true, 0 if false.
assertions.best_practices: Tests follow best practices (clear names, arrange-act-assert, etc.). Score 1 if excellent, 0.5 if good, 0 if poor.
